name: Solan
description: Solan is known as the 'Mushroom City of India' and is famous for its pleasant climate, apple orchards, and tomato cultivation. The district offers a perfect blend of natural beauty, adventure activities, and cultural heritage.

locations.name: Shoolini Mata Temple
locations.description: Ancient temple dedicated to Goddess Shoolini, offering panoramic views of the surrounding hills.

locations.name: Kasauli
locations.description: Kasauli is a charming hill station known for its colonial architecture, scenic views, and peaceful atmosphere. It's perfect for nature walks and bird watching.
locations.hours: Best time to visit: March to June

travelTips.bestTime: March to June for pleasant weather
travelTips.currency: Indian Rupee (INR) - ATMs available in town
travelTips.transportation: Regular buses from Delhi and Chandigarh
travelTips.accommodation: Wide range of hotels and guesthouses available

locations.name: Chail
locations.description: Chail is known for having the world's highest cricket ground and a beautiful palace. It offers stunning views of the surrounding mountains and valleys.
locations.hours: Best time to visit: March to June

locations.name: Barog
locations.description: Barog is a small hill station known for its toy train station and scenic beauty. It's a perfect stopover for those traveling on the Kalka-Shimla railway.
